ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors are indebted to Holeta Bee Research Center for logistic support for the entire activities. Our special thanks also go to technical staffs of Holeta Bee Research Center and participant experts from respective districts for their support during field activities and sample collection. Particularly, our thanks go to Dr. Admassu Addi for his technical support in PCA of pollen data.
